The Oblitercons/Stinkbomb/Ramhorn:

::Stinkbomb finished in the bridge, having taken apart plates in the walls, 
and putting charges in them.  All together there were five charges in the 
bridge, though strangely not in any importanat places (Teletran One for 
example), just plasces that would drain energy vastly::

"Now, if they all try to get me, like they will, I won't go down without a 
fight!" Stinkbomb yelled, laughing evily, cocking his heavy laser rifle (aka 
the rifle Dinobot had in Aftermath, after Other Voices P2)

"Stinkbomb!  I knew you were out to get me, just like everyone else here!" 
::Ramhorn yelled charging forward and slamming his elbow into Stinkbomb, 
sending both of them reeling into a wall::
"You won't get me!  I'm untouchable!" ::Ramhorn yelled, pulling out a wrench 
and slamming it across Stinkbomb's face, a spray of mech-fluid hitting the 
floor::

::Stinkbomb positioned the laser rifle so it was against Ramhorn's chest, 
pulling the trigger, the blast sent Ramhorn flying back, smashing into a 
computer panel ten feet away::

<Anyone in the Ark, this is Stinkbomb, Ramhorn has gone out of control, he's 
trying to get me and kill me and betray me to the Predacons!  I need 
assistance, please hurry!> Stinkbomb said over the com.

::Ramhorn began to get up, but Stinkbomb fired off another blast, this one 
blowing off three of Ramhorn's fingers on his left hand::

=========

::Dark One looked at the Predacon ship that had crashed, noticing a symbol::
"By Primus and the Chaos-Bringer, Koga Shuko!!!" (The Oblitercons not knowing 
Set had a hand in their creation)
<Pyro, get over here, immediately.  It's Koga Shuko, time for a little fun!>
"Open all out fire!"
::Dark One unloaded 25 shots from his sub-machine gun filled with explosive 
rounds, the clip sliding out, quickly being replaced, Dark One continuing to 
fire on the ship::

::Scavenger raised his missile launcher, firing off a rocket at the downed 
ship while on one knee::

::Breakdown fired off two grenades at the crashed ship::

::Hiss fired off several fusion blasts::
